name: RED RINK
description:
The air smells of spray paint and your skates are sharp, welcome to RED RINK

Red Rink is a live hockey brawler where you play a team of the finest demons, wolves, and uh, ducks etc. Instead of regular clubs, you have weapons to give that punch some extra punch.

The volatile puck-wizard explodes every 10 seconds stunning/knocking back, causing a dynamic where you should consider passing the puck to your opponents, just to give a knock-out gift.

Skull QuackersDepth SeekersPumpkingsRib ‘ smash its        Royal Ice QueensWolf Gang AlphaPUX Files                 Zluuuuuu           

Keyboard & Mouse
  • [WASD] & [Arrow Keys] - Move
  • [Mouse] - Aim
With puck:
  • [LMB] - Wrist shot
  • [RMB] - pass
Without puck:
  • [LMB] - Slapshot / Slashing
  • [RMB] - Swap selection
Controller Support (Xbox layout):
  • (Left stick) - Move & Aim
With puck:
  • (X) / (B) - Wrist shot
  • (A) - Pass
Without puck:
  • (X) / (B) - Slapshot / Slashing
  • (A) - Swap selection
